text: Joachim Gauck (24 January 1940) is a German politician and former Lutheran pastor. From 2012 to 2017, Gauck was the eleventh President of Germany after the Second World War. Gauck was elected with 991 votes of 1,232 voting people. == References == Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:German Lutheran pastors Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Members of the Volkskammer Category:People from Rostock Category:Politicians from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern Category:Presidents of Germany Category:Honorary Knights Grand Cross of the Order of the Bath Category:21st-century presidents of Germany
title: Joachim Gauck
